Introducing Sentinel!

Authentication in MongoDB made simple.

We're building the next-generation authentication solution for MongoDB developers!

Get Started

Features

This project was made to make authentication so much easier and faster for modern day, MongoDB developers.

Authentication

Simple and easy authentication with a MongoDB database.

Authorization

JWT-Based user authorization using cookie sessions

Functions

Easy to use functions for password reset, logout, etc.

Error/Success Handling

Simple methods to access error and success responses.

Auth Methods

Github, Google, Facebook, Twitter and more.

Roles and Perms

Different roles and permission levels for authorization.

Sentinel also includes a full stack library for backend and frontend auth/authorization.
